creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: One paneled green cotton tzute woven on a backstrap loom with zoomorphic patterns (rooster, peacock, deer and butterfly); four selvage ends; satin ribbon decorates the edge.
inscription: Recuerdo de Daniana Coc 1ero Octubre de 1959
title: Ceremonial Tzute
